name: Walkman Hero
description:
Walkman Hero is a 2.5D adventure game where you fight enemies with quick time events.

Controls: WASD for movement.  Arrow keys for REW and FFWD (prompted if avaliable). QTE uses the keyboard letter keys.

Level design & Programming - Szabolcs Tobak
3D artist - Imola Krizsánszky
UI design - Dénes Knyihár

Intro cinematic source Music

  • Medieval Song Village Consort-Always Music
  • Dark Man-Royalty Free Epic Music

Script - Szabolcs Tobak
Art & Edit - Dénes Knyihár

Twitter:  @Solara___       @CyborgPandas

(Some major features were lost in build due to incompetence will patch when possible!)

What was cut due to not enough time: 2 additional levels, a more detailed combat system, enemy variety, bossfight and additional animations.
